laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal range (0.98 mmol/L) reported once. It increased to 1.22 mmol/L at several occasions during re-evaluation.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistently normal to even increased levels noted; specific increases during re-evaluation not detailed.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Upper normal to high range noted, specifically ranging from 2.54 to 2.59 mmol/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistent hypocalciuria and high serum calcium levels noted at re-evaluation.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Blunted urine concentrating response to thirsting and DDAVP administration.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Response on two separate occasions showed a similar blunted reaction.
Response consistent with diagnosis not changing over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Compound heterozygous CLDN10 sequence variants found.
